Name: Hero Sword
About the game: A warrior who has not received the title of knight, in despair sets off on a long journey, where he finds on his head many monsters who rush into battle and want to kill the one who came to the wrong place, at the wrong time. Hero Sword is a 2d slasher game in which the player dodges tackles, cuts enemies with a sword, accumulates mana, hits with powerful charges of magic and fights off the advancing waves of monsters. Features of the game: - Waves of Enemies - Pixel Art - Music
Meta Title: Hero Sword: Apr 29, 2021, Reforged Group and Full Overview
